#include <iostream>
#include<map>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
   int n,count,max;
   char ans=123;
  // cout<<ans;
   string s;
   cin>>s;
   n=s.length();
//   map<int,char>mp;
//    map<int,char>::iterator it;
   count=1,max=-1;
   for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++){
	count=1;
       while(s[i]==s[i+1] && i<n-1){
            count++;
            i++;
       }
       if(count>max){
        max=count;
        ans=s[i];
       }
    else if(count==max && ans>s[i]){
        max=count;
        ans=s[i];
    }
   }
   cout<<ans<<endl<<max<<endl;
   
   return 0;
}
